column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Katy - Thanks for your great review. I'm glad you have enjoyed our ramen during your multiple visits. I agree the wait times and bathroom lines during peak hours can be tedious
column2: but we'll soon be opening more JINYA outposts in Houston
column3: which should alleviate some of these crowds. I appreciate your pointing out the potential culture gap in regards to communal seating
column5: and osme aspects of our dishes. There are numerous aspects to our restaurant that are steeped in Japanese culture since JINYA was founded by a gentleman named Tomo Takahashi who is Japanese by birth. Thank you again for visiting us and we look forward to serving you again soon!
